thread.title: A Fight Over A Handicapped Parking Spot Took A Weird Turn When The Morbidly Obese Lady Pulled Out Her Three-Toed Foot
thread.title_full: A Fight Over A Handicapped Parking Spot Took A Weird Turn When The Morbidly Obese Lady Pulled Out Her Three-Toed Foot

author: Chris Spags
title: A Fight Over A Handicapped Parking Spot Took A Weird Turn When The Morbidly Obese Lady Pulled Out Her Three-Toed Foot
text:
Hi. I had to see this. You have to see it now too. It’s like The Ring . I’m sorry. 
Wait. 
Yep. That is in fact the rare three-toed slob. And obviously this is a situation where there are no winners. Even the woman arguing with the big gal seemed to lose her will to live after she pulled that monstrosity she calls a foot out. I don’t know that it made her “win” the argument but it certainly helped it reach a faster conclusion. In that respect, I appreciate her monstrous hoof. No fist fighting, no racial epithets, just a big gal who tries to end situations with a diabetes foot and zero shame. I honestly think that her and Leland Scoots could fall in love despite his “Fuck yo toe” attitude. It’s a thin line between love and hate and with emotions that high, I could definitely see a need for some tension to be released. All I’m saying: Keep an open mind you two. You’re not so different after all. Chris Spags |
